title: 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum Review
author: Andrew (Editor)
text:
Diet Reviews / Probiotic Reviews / 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum Review 
This review is what happened after I obsessed for weeks over 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum. We like probiotics, so we focused closely on the ingredients, side effects, and scientific studies. Then, we analyzed numerous consumer reviews to get their take. Finally, we cull the data to give you the most pertinent facts with which to make your decision. 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum Readers:   Leptigen. What is 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum? 
First off, Complete Probiotics Platinum 1MD is a probiotic supplement designed to improve digestive health with the introduction of live bacteria into the intestinal tract. The product is vegan, non-dairy, non-GMO, gluten free, preservative free, and soy free. The ingredients in 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum are Bifidobacterium lactis B42L, Lactobacillus acidophilus L61A, bifidobacterium longum B12L, bifidobacterium bifid B66B, Lactobacillus casei L30C, Lactobacillus Plantarum L23P, lactobacillus gasseri L22G, lactobacillus salivarius L10S, lactobacillus rhamnosus L08R, lactobacillus bulgaricus L88B, Bacillus coagulans. 
1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum is made by 1MD, a company that manufacturers various health supplements. Those who are looking for where to buy 1MD Complete Probiotics, you should visit the company’s official website. Their website has substantial information about individual products but relatively little about the people who own the company or their background. They do claim to use only the highest quality ingredients and to manufacture at locations that exceed FDA requirements but read on… Gut health is a big deal right now in weight-loss. Worth a try? 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum Ingredients– “Too Many?” 
Our first concern is the sheer number of bacteria strains included in 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum. Most probiotics contain a few, but this product has eleven distinct strains. According to our Research Editor, “It is possible to have too much of a good thing. While it may initially appear impressive that the company has included so many different strains of bacteria, there is little evidence that this much is needed.” 
This unhappy dieter claimed, “I’d been told that some bacteria could help you lose weight and I figured since 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum had so many different kinds it would work the best. I only lost one pound the month I took it.” 
A disgruntled customer noted, “It made me more regular, but it didn’t help me lose weight.” 
Others were more pleased with the results. 
An optimistic reviewer explained, “I’ve had digestive issues for years that made it difficult for me to exercise. This has sorted a lot of that, and I was able to work out about three times a week.” Scroll   Side Effects– “Uncomfortable” 
One of the problems with introducing so many strains of bacteria at once is the increased potential for adverse effects. 
One shopper complained, “I started taking these and was in the bathroom all the time. It was embarrassing.” 
While another worried, “My stomach hurt so much from being bloated that I couldn’t keep taking it.” 
Others were less bothered by the side effects. 
There was a pleased client who mentioned, “I expected it to be sort of like a colon cleanse so I wasn’t shocked at how I felt and it tapered off eventually.” 
According to our research, products that rely on an overabundance of ingredients that subsequently have the potential to cause increased instances of side effects don’t always go over well once consumers begin using them. If Complete Probiotics Platinum by 1MD isn’t providing real results for people, it is unlikely they will continue using the product. The Science – “Interesting” 
At DietSpotlight we love to examine the scientific data that provided the impetus for the development of a product. In the case of 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum, there are several ingredients we found interesting. Studies have shown an imbalance of bacteria in the digestive tract can influence one’s weight. The various strains of lactobacillus and bifidobacterium are the two most typically ingested by humans. The real problem is the diversity of these species, which can also be seen in the list of ingredients. Some have been documented to promote weight management while others appear to do nothing or promote weight gain. The three ingredients in 1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum with the most scientific validity are lactobacillus gasseri, lactobacillus rhamonosus, and Bifidobacterium lactis. The other ingredients appear to have less of a reason to be included.   1MD Complete Probiotics Platinum Work? 
Should I race out for a bottle of Complete Probiotics Platinum 1MD? If you are having digestive health issues, it is possible that a probiotic would be beneficial. This is entirely dependent upon other health conditions. However, there’s nothing that sets this particular brand apart from other brands. We do like the focus placed on the digestive health. This, in turn, could promote weight-loss. 
If you are ready to lose weight, we suggest considering a product which was created with ingredients that are backed by scientific research to specifically address weight-loss. In our experience, excess ingredients can be problematic if they aren’t working synergistically with all of the others. 
  we’ve seen this year is our product Leptigen . It is made with a combination of four ingredients, which have each been demonstrated in documented clinical research to help increase fat loss and amplify metabolism. Throughout the course of our research we didn’t turn up any reviews that indicated harmful side effects, but we did discover a lot that showed people saw great results. 
The makers of Leptigen are so excited about their product they’re offering a Special Trial Offer . Get Your Sample Today   Gut health is a big deal right now in weight-loss. Worth a try?
